62.ara-name: كتاب فضائل أصحاب النبى صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Musa Al-Ash`ari:Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) said, "Many amongst men attained perfection but amongst women none attained the perfection except Mary, the daughter of `Imran and Asiya, the wife of Pharaoh. And the superiority of `Aisha to other women is like the superiority of Tharid (i.e. an Arabic dish) to other meals

chapter.ara-name: باب فَضْلِ عَائِشَةَ رضى الله عنها
chapter.eng-name: The superiority of 'Aishah رضي الله عنها
